text:
when you use log4j in 2 different places in your application, for 2 different 
logs, if one of them fails as a result of no space in directory
the other one fails as well, even though it has lots of room in it's directory
creator: yaelal@gmail.com

text: Please provide log4j configuration file for your scenario plus the disk layout provoking this issue.
creator: thorbjoern@gmail.com

text: No response in a month.  Setting to NEEDINFO
creator: thorbjoern@gmail.com
